/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, teeming with life, stretches out below, flanked by trees and buildings on both sides. Cars of various colors are scattered across the street, some stationary, others in motion, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds visible in the distance. The image is taken from a low angle, which accentuates the height of the buildings and gives a sense of depth to the scene. The colors in the image are bright and vibrant, reflecting the lively atmosphere of the city.
